zoom.title: Zoom
zoom.tooltip:
Zoom-in with [+]
zoom-out with [-]
or reset zoom with [Reset].
Furthermore, with [Shift+mouse wheel] you can also zoom.

filter.title: Filter
filter.tooltip: Filter the nodes base on given groups.

search.title: Search
search.tooltip: Search for a node in the network.

layout.title: Layout
layout.tooltip: Change the layout of the Network. Per default a [Force] directed layout is used. If x and y coordinates are given, an [Euclidean] layout can be used..

animation.title: Animation
animation.tooltip: Play and pause animation of the temproal network.
